name: Chicken Fried Rice
description: The basmati rice with chicken and vegetables is a combination you will make over and over!. Enjoy rice with roasted vegetables for a complete meal!

preparation.step1: In a casserole dish combine the rice and 3 cups water. Cook at 400F for 25-30 minutes (rice is ready when fluffy). Fluff rice, set aside to cool.
preparation.step2: In a skillet with 1 tsp oil cook the chicken until golden and fully cooked. Lightly season with salt and pepper.
preparation.step3: Remove the chicken from pan. Add 1 Tbsp butter with the carrots. Saut√© over medium heat until fully cooked. Remove carrots (add to chicken).
preparation.step4: Add 1 Tbsp butter and scramble the eggs, stirring as needed.
preparation.step5: Add the chicken and carrots back to the skillet with garlic, stir to incorporate.
preparation.step7: In a small bowl, combine ingredients for the sauce. Pour sauce into skillet. Add green onion. Fry another 2-3 minutes, stirring as needed.
